type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Redirect Lightning

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/redirect_lightning).

Redirects lightning to the power holder if a specified chance happens.

Type ID: `apugli:redirect_lightning`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:redirect_lightning",
    "chance": 0.5
}
```
This example creates a 50% chance that lightning will be redirected to the position of the power holder upon the lightning spawning in the world.

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/redirect_lightning).

Redirects lightning to the power holder if a specified chance happens.

Type ID: `apugli:redirect_lightning`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:redirect_lightning",
    "chance": 0.5

```
This example creates a 50% chance that lightning will be redirected to the position of the power holder upon the lightning spawning in the world.

chance.description: The chance at which lightning will be redirected to an entity. (Ranges from 0.0-1.0).
